types1:Item.types1:Name: api5_Partial_Over_Payments
types1:Item.types1:Description: Posts the Invoice clearance data to VPoint API and logs the same in SAP

process.name: api5_Partial_Over_Payments
process.description: Posts the Invoice clearance data to VPoint API and logs the same in SAP

assignment.title: Query for Receipt in VIP DB

query.where: APIName = '{$temp.tmp_SAPLog_KeyFields/SubID}' and CompanyCode = '{$temp.tmp_SAPLog_KeyFields/CompanyCode}' and KeyValue1 = '{$temp.tmp_SAPLog_KeyFields/KeyValue1}' and KeyValue2 = '{$temp.tmp_SAPLog_KeyFields/KeyValue2}' and KeyValue3 = '{$temp.tmp_SAPLog_KeyFields/KeyValue3}' Order By DateProcessed desc

assignment.title: Check if receipt is found in VIP DB

operation.expression: util:iif($temp.tmp_BANumber_Found_Flag='N' and $temp.tmp_ProformaNr_Found_Flag='N', 'InvoiceHeader and valid BankAccount data not found', util:iif($temp.tmp_BANumber_Found_Flag='N', 'Valid BankAccount data not found', util:iif($temp.tmp_ProformaNr_Found_Flag='N', 'InvoiceHeader data not found')))

util:iif($temp.tmp_BANumber_Found_Flag='N' and $temp.tmp_ProformaNr_Found_Flag='N', 'ProformaNr and BANumber not found: No matching data found in InvoiceHeader and BankAccounts/RevBankAccounts tables', util:iif($temp.tmp_BANumber_Found_Flag='N', 'BANumber not found: No matching data found in BankAccounts/RevBankAccounts table', util:iif($temp.tmp_ProformaNr_Found_Flag='N', 'ProformaNr not found: No matching data found in InvoiceHeader table')))

create.title: Create SAPLog Failure entry in VIP DB

operation.expression: <root> <IsBatch>false</IsBatch> <CancelledDate>{fn:current-date()}</CancelledDate> <Reference>{$input.in_ClearedPaymentEntry/AccountingDocument } </Reference> <Note>Cancelled by VIP due to Incomplete processing</Note> <CancelPayment>false</CancelPayment> </root>

input.parameter: VPC : GET BankAccount and Invoice data
